member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.MapDivID
member.summary: What is the ID of the Div used to show the map (do not include a '#')

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.DivTitle
member.summary: Text that appears when mousing over the div

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.UseFullStateNames
member.summary: true = full state name (Michigan) false = Abbreviated state names (MI)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.UseStateLabels
member.summary: true=show labes on each state, false=blank

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.StateTextFontColor
member.summary: color of font on state

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.StateValues
member.summary: Provide a Datatable with two columns - 1:state abbrev. (eg. MI) 2:hex color (eg. #FF0000)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.useLegendValuesToColorStates
member.summary: Apply legend ranges and colors to states table

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.showMouseOvers
member.summary: Whether the map will show mouseovers with state data (eg: MI: 56.76)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.MouseOverBackGroundColor
member.summary: Background color of the mouseovers on the map

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.MouseOverTextColor
member.summary: Color of the mouseover text on the maps

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.MapTitleLine1
member.summary: First line of map title - will need trial and error Mapping tool doesn't have word wrap

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.MapTitleLine2
member.summary: Second line of map title - will need trial and error Mapping tool doesn't have word wrap

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.MapTitleTextFontLine1
member.summary: What font-family to use for the title? (eg. calibri)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.MapTitleFontColorLine1
member.summary: What color should the Title Text be? (eg. #ff0000)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.MapTitleTextFontSizeLine1
member.summary: How big to make Map Title Font (eg. 22px)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.MapTitleTextFontLine2
member.summary: What font-family to use for the title Line2? (eg. calibri)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.MapTitleFontColorLine2
member.summary: What color should the Title Text be (Line 2)? (eg. #ff0000)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.MapTitleTextFontSizeLine2
member.summary: How big to make Map Title Font Line 2(eg. 12px)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.LegendValues
member.summary: Provide a DataTable with two string-valued columns - first column: legend text | second columns: Hex color for box (eg. #FF0000) (or color name eg: silver).

summary.summary: Add the title that will appear above the legend.

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.LegendFontSize
member.summary: Legend font size

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.LegendTextFont
member.summary: What font-family to use for the legend? (eg. calibri)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.LegendTextFontColor
member.summary: What color should the Legend Text be? (eg. #ff0000)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.LogoPath
member.summary: Relative path to the logo (will have to be appropriately sized)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.LogoTextLine1
member.summary: First line of Logo Text (map tool has no understanding of word wrap)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.LogoTextLine2
member.summary: Second line of Logo Text (map tool has no understanding of word wrap)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.LogoTextFont
member.summary: What font family to use with the logo text? (eg. Times, Verdana)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.LogoFontSize
member.summary: How big should the font be? (eg. 12px)

member.name: P:ckdlibV2.MapBuilder.LogoFontColor
member.summary: What color should the Logo Text be? (eg. #ff0000)
